body_html:
@andydavis1

i tried tf.train.latest_checkpoint(). but it returned None

full_path = tf.train.latest_checkpoint(checkpoint_dir)
print("full_path = %s" % full_path)

$ python test_word2vec.py --model_path=/path/to/segm-lstm/tensorflow/tensorflow/models/embedding/tmp
...
full_path = None
checkpoint_dir = /path/to/segm-lstm/tensorflow/tensorflow/models/embedding/aaa
checkpoint_path = model.ckpt-20879
...

interestingly, the reverse case works.

$ python word2vec_optimized.py --train_data=text8 --eval_data=questions-words.txt --save_path=/path/to/segm-lstm/tensorflow/tensorflow/models/embedding/tmp

$ python test_word2vec.py --model_path=tmp
$ python test_word2vec.py --model_path=/path/to/segm-lstm/tensorflow/tensorflow/models/embedding/tmp

i.e, training with full-path and testing with full-path or relative-path are no problem.

body:
@andydavis1 

i tried tf.train.latest_checkpoint(). but it returned `None`

``` shell

full_path = tf.train.latest_checkpoint(checkpoint_dir)
print("full_path = %s" % full_path)

$ python test_word2vec.py --model_path=/path/to/segm-lstm/tensorflow/tensorflow/models/embedding/tmp
...
full_path = None
checkpoint_dir = /path/to/segm-lstm/tensorflow/tensorflow/models/embedding/aaa
checkpoint_path = model.ckpt-20879
...
```

interestingly, the reverse case works. 

``` shell

$ python word2vec_optimized.py --train_data=text8 --eval_data=questions-words.txt --save_path=/path/to/segm-lstm/tensorflow/tensorflow/models/embedding/tmp

$ python test_word2vec.py --model_path=tmp
$ python test_word2vec.py --model_path=/path/to/segm-lstm/tensorflow/tensorflow/models/embedding/tmp
```

i.e, training with full-path and testing with full-path or relative-path are no problem.
